shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the first local video frame is displayed.
Callback when the first local video frame is rendered.
Callback when the first local video frame is displayed.
Callback when the first local video frame is rendered.

p.codeblock: public virtual void OnFirstLocalVideoFrame(VIDEO_SOURCE_TYPE source, int width, int height, int elapsed) { }

section.p: This callback is triggered when the first local video frame is displayed in the local view.
This callback is triggered when the first local video frame is displayed in the local view.
This callback is triggered by the SDK when the first local video frame is displayed in the local view.
The SDK triggers this callback when the first local video frame is rendered on the local view.

plentry.pd: The type of video source. See .
The width (px) of the locally rendered video.
The height (px) of the locally rendered video.
Time elapsed (ms) from calling to the occurrence of this event. If / was called before joining the channel, this parameter indicates the time elapsed from calling or to the occurrence of this event.
The type of video source. See .
Width (px) of the locally rendered video.
Height (px) of the locally rendered video.
Time elapsed in milliseconds from calling to this event. If / was called before joining the channel, this parameter indicates the time from calling or to this event.
Width (px) of the locally rendered video.
Height (px) of the locally rendered video.

Time elapsed (ms) from calling to the occurrence of this event. If / is called before joining the channel, this parameter indicates the time from starting the local video preview to the occurrence of this event.
The type of video source. See .
The width (px) of the locally rendered video.
The height (px) of the locally rendered video.
Time elapsed (ms) from calling or to when this event occurs. If / was called before joining the channel, this parameter indicates the time elapsed from calling or to when this event occurs.
